scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss & npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
scripts.start: concurrently " npm run watchscss " " npm run dev "
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin contacto.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contacto.html && usemin precios.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/precios.html && usemin terminos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/terminos.html
